*******************

below:

* Building/Installing

* Installing the Python DyNet module.

  * TL;DR

  * Detailed Instructions:

  * Installing with GPU support

* Using the GPU:

* DyNet Command Line Options

* DyNet Tutorial

The following can be referenced when implementing your models in
DyNet:

* DyNet Operations

* DyNet Builders

* DyNet Optimizers

* Multi-processing in DyNet
